chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_const; template<class T> using remove_const_t = typename remove_const<T>::type;
chapter.p: A type transformer. Removes the top-level const qualifier or just returns T if it doesn't have such qualifier.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_volatile; template<class T> using remove_volatile_t = typename remove_volatile<T>::type;
chapter.p: A type transformer. Removes the top-level volatile qualifier or just returns T if it doesn't have such qualifier.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_cv; template<class T> using remove_cv_t = typename remove_cv<T>::type;
chapter.p: A type transformer. Removes any top-level cv-qualifier or just returns T if it doesn't have such qualifiers.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_reference; template<class T> using remove_reference_t = typename remove_reference<T>::type;
chapter.p: A type transformer. Returns the type referred by T or just T if it isn't a reference type.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_cvref; template<class T> using remove_cvref_t = typename remove_cvref<T>::type;
chapter.p: Applies remove_reference then remove_cv to T.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> struct remove_pointer; template<class T> using remove_pointer_t = typename remove_pointer<T>::type;
chapter.p: A type transformer. Returns the type of the object to that the pointer type points or just T if it isn't a pointer type.
